amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the beginning date for mandatory spending for programs in the bill from fiscal year 2002 to fiscal year 2006.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 106-612 to shift the beginning date for mandatory spending for programs in the bill from fiscal year 2002 to fiscal year 2006.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chambliss amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 281 (Roll no. 167).
